[@microsoft/fast-element/context.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [FASTContextRequestStrategy](../fast-element.fastcontextrequeststrategy/index.html)

## FASTContextRequestStrategy type

A strategy that controls how all Context.request API calls are handled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FASTContextRequestStrategy = <T extends UnknownContext>(target: EventTarget, context: T, callback: ContextCallback<ContextType<T>>, multiple: any) => void;
```
**References:** [UnknownContext](../fast-element.unknowncontext/)<!-- -->, [ContextCallback](../fast-element.contextcallback/)<!-- -->, [ContextType](../fast-element.contexttype/)

## Remarks

By default this is handled via Context.dispatch, which dispatches a ContextEvent.
